speaker: detective
dialogue: (The sun is almost set as I make my way back to the Fizzy Fort, the place is empty except for the Mothfather sitting by himself in his corner booth.)

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: Ah Detective, you've made your way back. Am I to assume the job is done?

speaker: detective
dialogue: Yes, Officer Barry will leave your operation alone. Now where is Sheila?

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: Wonderful! Here's the information you wanted. (He puts a small folder on the table.) And I'll have my man take your to her last known location. He'll be outside with a car.

speaker: detective
dialogue: Thank you. (The words feel sour in my mouth, what am I doing? Helping the Mothfia? For what? Some small hints and a last known location? I guess this is the lot of the unconnected and desperate. I steel myself for the future as I step into the car.)
